content: Has anyone considered a variation on _history that only considers the most recent change (for quickly getting up to speed)
If a resource has 290 edits, and then deleted, just show me the deleted..
Adding support for _count makes sense to me for that
History already has _count (and paging) so good there, its just the volume of data involved in stuff that changes a lot, and you just want to get to latest without filtering client side.
Our use case is updating a directory that has roughly 120,000 pracs, and 400,000 updates and want to get the latest since last retrieved a month ago.
So the volume of data is quite significant.
Ah, I see. Get the latest change for each of the resources that has changed since _since. Makes sense. Should not be hard to implement for generic servers. I suggest ?_latest=1.
